product_name: Mizuno Wave Prophecy 3 Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Built for neutral runners, the men's Mizuno Wave Prophecy 3 Road-Running Shoes provide full-length cushioning and support whether you're jogging around the town or blasting past the 20-mile marker. Breathable mesh uppers keep feet cool and dry when you're working up a sweat. Mizuno Wave(R) midsole technology disperses impact uniformly over the length and width of the midsole, providing unrivaled cushioning. U4ic midsole material provides resilient cushioning, and it's 30% lighter than the AP+ midsole found in other Mizuno shoes. Dynamotion Fit(TM) features uppers that mirror the motion of your feet so that you can run your best without any bunching, pulling or sliding. SmoothRide(TM) technology features flex grooves in the heels that promote natural movement from heels to toes, initiating a smooth rocking motion. The men's Mizuno Wave Prophecy 3 Road-Running Shoes have rubber outsoles with deep flex grooves that deliver cushioning, flexibility and durability in high-impact areas.
short_description: Built for neutral runners, the men's Mizuno Wave Prophecy 3 Road-Running Shoes provide full-length cushioning and support whether you're jogging around the town or blasting past the 20-mile marker.
